mapper.select: SELECT b.subject_no subjectNo ,a.member_id memberId ,a.student_name studentName ,a.student_gender studentGender ,a.student_phone studentPhone ,a.student_education studentEducation ,a.student_register_date studentRegisterDate FROM student AS a INNER JOIN subject_student AS b ON a.member_id = b.member_id WHERE b.subject_no = #{subjectNo} ORDER BY subjectNo DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
